short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension side panel to interact with the Straico API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Straico Assistant is a Chrome extension designed to facilitate interaction with the Straico API. It allows users to enter their API key, select models, and communicate with the API while storing message history.


Sign up for Straico with the following link https://platform.straico.com/signup?fpr=hossamgouda 

Get your API key for free you will receive 1,000 monthly coins use it as you go.

Features of Straico Platfomr:

Diverse Tools, One Platform: Access multiple generative AI models for text, images, and audio without needing separate subscriptions.

Tailored AI Selection: Easily find the right AI model for your specific tasks.

Maximize Productivity: Use a personal AI assistant to enhance your creative process.

Model Variety: Choose from models for text generation, image creation, code development, analysis, and role-playing.

Prompt Templates: Utilize over 130 templates designed for various AI models to speed up your workflow. You can also create and save your own templates.

Media Intelligence: Upload and query files in various formats (pdf, txt, docx, pptx, xlsx, jpg, png, mp3, mp4) or link to YouTube videos and web pages for enhanced insights.

Collab Sharing: Share your work with others easily and promote collaboration within the community.

In-App Guides: Access guides to help you navigate and make the most of the platform's features.

Data Privacy: Your data and creations remain exclusively yours, with no usage for model training purposes.

Multiple Subscription Plans: Choose from various pricing plans that offer different levels of access to AI models and features.
